name: 通向星辰之路 | ToOuterSpace
description:
字节跳动朝夕光年高校游戏开发挑战赛  三等奖作品

太空题材 | 物理引擎解谜

This is the game designed by WHU Bugoo Studio during the Nuverse 2021 gamejam and finished in less than 36 hours. Due to the rules, all the materials except the background-image are our original work (music made with GarageBand). According to the topic, we build a straightforward game which helps the player get to know how a spacecraft could accelerate or slow down in order to orbit around a planet. Our levels render a steady progress for those who are not familiar with physics. At the very end, our spacecraft passes by the Voyager 1. Hope we could travel to outer solar system some day, and enjoy our simple game :)
